mapper.insert: insert into finance_batch ( id, batch_no, receipt_time, create_time, channe_no, file_name1, file_name2, file_name3, file_name4, file_name5, file_name6, thirdback_amount, flag, status, success_total, faile_total )values ( #{id}, #{batchNo}, #{receiptTime}, #{createTime}, #{channeNo}, #{fileName1}, #{fileName2}, #{fileName3}, #{fileName4}, #{fileName5}, #{fileName6}, #{thirdbackAmount}, #{flag}, #{status}, #{successTotal}, #{faileTotal} )
mapper.update:
update finance_batch
id=#{id},
batch_no=#{batchNo},
receipt_time=#{receiptTime},
create_time=#{createTime},
channe_no=#{channeNo},
file_name1=#{fileName1},
file_name2=#{fileName2},
file_name3=#{fileName3},
file_name4=#{fileName4},
file_name5=#{fileName5},
file_name6=#{fileName6},
thirdback_amount=#{thirdbackAmount},
flag=#{flag},
status=#{status},
success_total=#{successTotal},
faile_total=#{faileTotal},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, batch_no, receipt_time, create_time, channe_no, file_name1, file_name2, file_name3, file_name4, file_name5, file_name6, thirdback_amount, flag, status, success_total, faile_total from finance_batch where id=#{id}

select id, batch_no, receipt_time, create_time, channe_no, file_name1, file_name2, file_name3, file_name4, file_name5, file_name6, thirdback_amount, flag, status, success_total, faile_total from finance_batch where id=#{id}

select id, batch_no, receipt_time, create_time, channe_no, file_name1, file_name2, file_name3, file_name4, file_name5, file_name6, thirdback_amount, flag, status, success_total, faile_total
limit #{offset},#{rows}
